content: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Nice to meet you, Amit! How can I help you today?
Iâ€™m your Digital Twin, representing Amit! I'm here to answer your questions about AI, Amit's work, and anything else you might be curious about. How can I assist you?
Yes, you mentioned your name is Amit. How can I assist you further?
How do you know my name. Do you keep that cached in your memory?

I don't have the ability to remember or store information beyond our current conversation. I only know your name because you shared it with me just now. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to let me know!
